name: Boost by Design
tagline: Built for business. Designed for success.
description:
We pride ourselves on strategy-led marketing that is aggressively focused on increasing your bottom line. All ideas are rigorously investigated, tested and carefully crafted prior to execution. Furthermore, our campaigns are targeted to your market, your industry, and your competitive landscape. We consult primarily with businesses in the coastal empire, but also have successful partnerships with companies that compete on a national scale.
 
Our team is comprised of consultants with advanced degrees in their respective fields as well as with individuals possessing the highest professional certifications available in both digital and traditional medias. We combine a broad-range of real world experience with specialized educations. This marriage of theory and practice is critical to our strategic approach. Combined, our consulting team has over 50 years of applied lateral thinking and expertise behind them.
